home.title: Certified Remote Employment Service Provider
home.heroSubTitle: Developing, employing, and training national workforce by connecting remote workers through the Remote Work Platform

improve.preTitle: Improve Performance Levels in Your Organization
improve.subTitle: This text is an example of a non-real text that can be replaced in the same space. This text has been generated as a placeholder.

choose.subTitle: Danat Al-Sharqiya is a leading Saudi company offering a wide range of services to enhance quality and improve organizational efficiency in Saudi Arabia through the employment and training of national workforce.
choose.1sub: Through accredited institutes for remote training for a period of 12 months
choose.2sub: Through specialized institutes accredited by the Technical and Vocational Training Corporation
choose.3sub: By establishing a strategic partnership with the Industrial Secondary Institute to provide employees with specialized and accredited training courses and diplomas

services.title: Danat Services
services.list1: Issuing all invoices related to sales and purchases
services.list2: Including return invoices, tax invoices, and others
services.list3: Tracking all reports related to sales, purchases, and other transactions over the year through the Al-Arabi platform.
services.list4: Providing consultancy on structuring and managing remote workers
services.list5: Connecting remote workers with the Ministry of Human Resources platform

pricing.title: Danat Subscriptions for Remote Work
pricing.subTitle: Choose the subscription that suits you from Danat's remote work platform. Whether your company is small, medium, or large, we have the right subscription to meet your business needs and budget.

BASIC.NAME: Danat Basic
BASIC.title: A limited-feature subscription suitable for small enterprises

FEATURES.FEATURE3: Employee registration in the Remote Work Portal of the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development
FEATURES.FEATURE6: Compatible with all operating systems and devices

SILVER.NAME: Danat Silver
SILVER.title: A subscription that meets the basic needs of small and medium enterprises

FEATURES.FEATURE2: Complete management of the hiring process
FEATURES.FEATURE3: Selection of remote employees who meet the requirements
FEATURES.FEATURE4: One-week self-training for employees and managers in the organization
FEATURES.FEATURE5: Complete management of the hiring process, including selection, job interviews, scheduling and management of personal interviews, CV management, search, evaluation, classification, and nomination until the employment contract signing stage
FEATURES.FEATURE6: Assistance in registering all remote employees in the Remote Work Portal of the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development (through delegation to Danat Al-Sharqiya to complete and follow up all registration procedures)
FEATURES.FEATURE7: Providing organizational, technical capabilities, and systems for companies to communicate with remote employees in measurable tasks.
FEATURES.FEATURE8: Providing backup copies of all data
FEATURES.FEATURE9: Managing all maintenance, operation, security, and software tools to benefit from technical advancements
FEATURES.FEATURE10: Automated integration with the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development systems
FEATURES.FEATURE11: Continuous updates with no additional costs for the organization
FEATURES.FEATURE12: Completion of hiring processes within a maximum of 10 working days

PLATINUM_REMOTE.NAME: Danat Gold
PLATINUM_REMOTE.title: A subscription that meets the professional needs of large enterprises and those requiring specialized services

FEATURES.FEATURE3: One-time employee replacement every 6 months at no extra charge
FEATURES.FEATURE4: Continuous productivity monitoring with monthly performance reports
FEATURES.FEATURE5: Providing and implementing remote employment plans for each profession
FEATURES.FEATURE6: Assisting in job classification for remote work and providing job classification details
FEATURES.FEATURE7: Supervising remote employees during the first three months with a structured training and qualification program
FEATURES.FEATURE8: Sending monthly reports for project management systems and remote employee performance measurement
FEATURES.FEATURE9: Providing organizations with necessary reports to obtain direct financial support from the Human Resources Development Fund
FEATURES.FEATURE11: Comprehensive remote work management solutions through a range of services tailored to remote work environments
FEATURES.FEATURE12: A monthly visit by the service execution team to the organization's headquarters to complete implementation and address needs for better service utilization
FEATURES.FEATURE13: Providing suitable replacements for remote employees in case of resignation

employmentPage.thanks: Thank you for reaching out to us,
employmentPage.workingOnRequest: Your request is under review, and a coordinator will contact you as soon as possible.
